FuncDef: This command configures the half-life decay time and the maximum period of time for which the port-up state can be suppressed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time, in seconds, that must pass before penalties decay to one-half the initial amount. Values-1 to 2000. ParamDefault: Default- 5

Specifies the maximum suppression time, in seconds, which is the time it can take after the physical link comes up before the worst case accumulated penalties have decayed to the reuse threshold. The maximum penalty is derived from the maximum suppression time, half-life, and reuse threshold, using the following equation:. Values-1 to 43200. ParamDefault: Default- 20
